data.eml:eml: Macrobiotus sklodowskae sp. nov. (Tardigrada: Eutardigrada: Macrobiotidae, richtersi group) from Cyprus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Michalczyk, Łukasz, Kaczmarek, Łukasz, Węglarska, Barbara (2006): Macrobiotus sklodowskae sp. nov. (Tardigrada: Eutardigrada: Macrobiotidae, richtersi group) from Cyprus. Zootaxa 1371: 45-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174916
